Package com.suganya.reports

Class ExtentReport

java.lang.Object
com.suganya.reports.ExtentReport
public final class ExtentReport extends Object
Class for instantiating Extent Report file and writing data of all the run tests details to the report.
Author:
Suganya Jothiramalingam

    • extent

      private static com.aventstack.extentreports.ExtentReports extent
      Variable to declare and initialize ExtentReports as a single copy to be shared by all instances of the class

  • Constructor Details

    • ExtentReport

      private ExtentReport()
      Private Constructor to prevent external Initialization of the class

  • Method Details

    • initReports

      public static void initReports()
      Method to initialize and create the Extent Report in the format of ExtentSparkReporter (HTML) in the location configured in Framework

      Also, make the required alterations to the report created such as setting Theme, Title, Report name.

    • flushReports

      public static void flushReports()
      Method to flush the test information from the started reporters to the output view of HTML

      Also, once data is flushed to the report

      • Current thread of ExtentTest instance is removed using ExtentManager
      • Extent report created is opened in the default browser window for the users to view

    • createTest

      public static void createTest(String testCaseName)
      Method to create an Extent Test for the Test case passed as parameter using ExtentManager
      Parameters:
      testCaseName - Name of the test case for which the Extent Test instance needs to be created

    • addAuthors

      public static void addAuthors(String[] authors)
      Method to assign authors to the Extent Test created
      Parameters:
      authors - List of authors to be assigned to the ExtentTest

    • addCategories

      public static void addCategories(CategoryType[] categories)
      Method to assign categories to the Extent Test created
      Parameters:
      categories - List of categories to be assigned to the ExtentTest
